thumb.title: Seaside Cafe / t.g.w feat.花隈千冬
thumb.description: 「Seaside Cafe」Words / ACO(REVE NOCTURNE)Music / t.g.wIllust / たろたろFilled with the scent of coffee A breeze coming, kiss meMelting all in a dayIt’s time to read a book todayI feel crystal blue world, float far awayAh, in a calm lightThe wind’s gonna play and turn the page With a smile, I lay my hand on it and close my eyesYou know, wonder why the sky's blueMaybe this lovely sea makes it silent blueCaressed by the sound of sea wavesThe shells shining, call meClouds swimming in the skyI lean back in my chairSomething draws me into falling asleepAh, in a daydreamA doorway just starts to open wideWith my heart, the cast’s gonna lead me to the new taleYou know, wonder why the sea's blueMaybe this lovely sky makes it silent blue----------------------------------------------------------M3-2025秋の新譜に収録される楽曲です。https://x.com/paruparu_tgw
thumb.last_res_body: 涼し気なサウンド... 期待して来たけど... 良いサウンド うぽつー 8888888888888 すごい素敵な曲で... うぽつ 88888888888 うぽつです！ 888888...

tags.tag: 花隈千冬オリジナル曲
